SUB_W19_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Mmm. There seems to be little
darkness in this world.

SUB_W19_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
But the cruelty of nature can oft surpass
even that of humanity, so perhaps I've a
chance to find a worthy thrall after all.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Are you trying to say
something to me, bird?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, you're bowing your head to me?
How encouraging that you are so
quick to recognize my majesty.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Mmm? I am to ride upon your back?
This ill befits a king, but very well.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Look at this vast world spread across
the branches of a single tree.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_010_020.text:
There appear to be statues of animals scattered
throughout—or perhaps they are not statues,
but animals petrified through some ill means.
Is this what you wished me to see?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_000.text:
So you wish for me to
save these creatures?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_020.text:
What am I to use these for? I imagine this
flute is used for summoning you, yes?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_060.text: Let me give this some thought.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_000_CUT_020_080.text:
I should go to that patch of vines?
Very well.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_010_CUT_000_010.text: Worry not! I can handle this.

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I can use these vines
to ascend a level.

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Am I to use them to descend as well?
Bah. This all seems a hassle.

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_020_000.text: The bugs are eating the vines.

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_000.text:
I now see the waterfall that
was hidden behind the vines.

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_010.text:
The waterfall should make it quite
simple to descend from above to below.

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_020.text:
So using bugs changes vines into waterfalls.
But as I have a limited amount, I must
carefully consider when to use them.

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_030.text:
It is clear I am to ascend on vines and
descend on waterfalls, but what purpose
do these seeds serve?

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_040.text:
Perhaps they turn waterfalls into vines?
Let us give that a try.

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_060.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_060.text: Take a stick from the beaver's lodge!

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_000_CUT_030_070.text:
What was that just now? Something about
a beaver's dam? But what is a beaver?

SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_099_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_GIMK_SIUG_IVY_099_CUT_000_000.text: I've no business here at the moment.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_BEAVER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_BEAVER_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I shall help myself to
one of your sticks.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_000.text:
I have claimed a stick.
Is this sufficient?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I have learned to use vines and waterfalls,
as well as seeds and bugs. But I do not yet
know how to rescue these petrified creatures.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_040.text:
If this is a matter of importance
to you, might you join me?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_060.text:
Ah, I see. Unpetrifying is a task for
visitors from outside this world.
That must be a rule of this place.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_EAGLE_020_CUT_000_080.text:
So be it. I would not want my journey here to
end without some semblance of a challenge,
and I had intended to search this world for
a worthy thrall regardless.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_TURTLE_PUSHES_TREE_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_TURTLE_PUSHES_TREE_CUT.text:
The shell beast from before indicated
a willingness to lend me its strength.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_TURTLE_PUSHES_TREE_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_TURTLE_PUSHES_TREE_CUT.text:
Perhaps this tree would prove
a good test of said strength?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.text:
If I can knock down this tree, I should
be able to cross to the other side.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.text:
Mmm? Some furball gnaws at the trunk.
Does it intend to help me?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_BEAVER_CUTS_TREE_CUT_0.text:
Well done, furball! This should make
toppling trees a trivial matter.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.text: This is the last of my seeds.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.text: I will turn this waterfall into vines.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_CHANGE_CASCADE_TO_IVY_.text: I must give this more thought.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_.text: This is the last of my bugs.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_CHANGE_IVY_TO_CASCADE_.text: I will make these vines a waterfall.

SUB_W19_WRLD_SIUG_EAGLE_WHISTLE_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_WRLD_SIUG_EAGLE_WHISTLE_CUT_000_.text:
Given the situation,
this seems for the best.

SUB_W19_WRLD_SIUG_EAGLE_WHISTLE_GAMEEND_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_WRLD_SIUG_EAGLE_WHISTLE_GAMEEND_.text: I have unpetrified all the animals.

SUB_W19_WRLD_SIUG_EAGLE_WHISTLE_GAMEEND_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_WRLD_SIUG_EAGLE_WHISTLE_GAMEEND_.text: Perhaps I should look around more?

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_ALL_GUARDIANS_SAVED_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_ALL_GUARDIANS_SAVED_CU.text:
I have saved all the
petrified animals.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_ALL_GUARDIANS_SAVED_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_ALL_GUARDIANS_SAVED_CU.text: I should let the bird know.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Is there a reason to remain in this world?
Some animals yet remain petrified, but...

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.text: No. I must save them all.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_WORLDEXIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
It does not seem this world will be
overrun with darkness imminently.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_00.text: I have unpetrified all the animals.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Such is the benevolence of kings. Though I was
not given the chance to behold human darkness,
I learned this world contains beings of great
appeal all the same—and this is thanks to you.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_000_CUT_000_05.text:
As to how the animals may have been petrified,
I can only assume darkness lurks somewhere
in this world, and I very much look forward
to seeing it reveal itself.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_100_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_100_CUT_000_05.text:
Aaah ha ha ha ha! Excellent!
Show me the darkness within you!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_00.text:
So the loser of the battle
is petrified? Interesting.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_01.text:
It is not my duty to unpetrify you, bird.
You'll need wait for the next visitor.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_02.text:
Perhaps the petrification is the result
of a curse upon this world? Or perhaps... No. It matters not. This world has proven
itself more interesting than I initially
suspected, and that is enough for me.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_100_CUT_010_03.text:
I will be on my way shortly.
Farewell, creatures.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_02.text: You would challenge the Dismal King?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_04.text:
Do not think being a small woodland
creature entitles you to my mercy!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_06.text: Wings of darkness, heed my power!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_08.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_08.text:
Do you think that shell can
shield you from my strength?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_10.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_000_10.text: You will be the last to fall, bird!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_00.text:
So the loser of the battle
is petrified? Interesting.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_01.text:
But what possible purpose could these
battles serve? Alas, none remain who
might answer that question.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_200_CUT_010_02.text:
What a fascinating world this is.
I will sorely miss it.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_300_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_300_CUT_000_02.text:
Aaah ha ha ha! Excellent, creatures!
Show the Dismal King your might!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_300_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_300_CUT_010_00.text:
Is it over? Ah, but it is never over.
The animals have been petrified,
and the cycle begins anew.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_300_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GAMEEND_300_CUT_010_01.text:
But who will unpetrify you next time?
I hope you find your answer soon.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.text: Mmm? Some manner of small animal.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.text:
It appears it was trying to eat something,
but what food does such a creature eat?
Seeds, perhaps? Or berries?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_STO.text:
If I find something like that,
I will bring it here for you.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STO.text:
I believe this creature is known
as a bear? It's quite large.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STO.text:
It would take considerable magical power
to petrify so gigantic a being.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STO.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_STO.text:
Mmm. It appears to be missing some fangs.
Perhaps I'd best locate them.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_CUT.text:
You are not so brave as to attack
the man who just saved you, then?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_07_CUT.text: So be it. On to the next.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.text:
Is this a bat? But bats fly upon wings
of darkness, and this creature has none.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.text:
It holds something in its mouth.
Is this a seed?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.text:
Even the seed has been petrified.
I'll not be able to take it until
I've unpetrified the bat.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_STONE.text:
Be patient, bat, and I will see
your wings returned to you.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.text:
You need not think me, bat; you are a
fellow creature of the dark, and it is
only natural you receive my blessing.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.text:
That said, however, I would
like that seed of yours.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_NEST_02_CUT_0.text:
It may be the key to unpetrifying
another small creature, you see.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STON.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STON.text:
This shelled creature is also petrified.
I wonder if it is this color on the inside
as well as the outside.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STON.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_STON.text:
Mmm. A part of the shell is missing.
Should I find the lost piece,
I will return it to you.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_CUT_.text:
The creature does not move.
Was it successfully unpetrified?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_SWAMP_06_CUT_.text:
You wish to aid me in order to
express your thanks? I accept.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_C.text:
This large frog appears to be
attempting to eat something.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_C.text: Is that not a bat wing?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_C.text:
I must secure that wing before it
ends up in the creature's stomach!

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.text:
That is quite the large frog.
What is it eating?

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.text: Has it noticed the large fly?

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_01_ROUTE2_A.text:
The temerity of this creature,
to challenge the Dismal King!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_02_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_02_CUT_000_.text:
Bones from some beast, no doubt.
Could these fangs fit the bear?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_02_EARLY_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_02_EARLY_CU.text:
Bones from some beast. They're quite
beautiful—perhaps I'll take them.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_000_.text: Mmm. The snake is wary of me.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_000_.text:
Is it protecting its eggs? I cannot help
but desire whatever it safeguards so.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_010_.text:
These are bird eggs? Was the snake
merely protecting a meal, then?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_03_CUT_010_.text: What should I do with these now?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_04_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_04_CUT_000_.text:
Mmm? It appears to be
attempting to eat something.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_04_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_04_CUT_000_.text: That might be one of the bat's wings.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_04_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_04_CUT_000_.text:
I'd best secure it before it ends up
in the creature's stomach.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.text:
The furball is moving around.
I should take a closer look.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.text:
Something appears to be targeting
the furball. What shall I do?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.text:
Perhaps the creature was simply curious
about what the furball was making?
Certainly its unlucky day, if so.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_05_ROUTE2_C.text: A reward for your king? I accept.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_C.text:
What a gigantic fly. Were it a little
larger, I might be able to ride it.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_C.text:
While I'm sure it could handle smaller
insects with ease, it has wisdom enough
not to threaten the Dismal King.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_E.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_E.text:
A fly should live with other flies.
Such is your destiny.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_E.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_SWAMP_06_ROUTE2_E.text:
I see you have accepted your destiny.
Farewell then, fly.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_01_AUTO_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_01_AUTO_CUT_.text:
A spider? Away with you!
I've no business with your kind.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_01_AUTO_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_01_AUTO_CUT_.text:
You believe yourself worthy
to consume the Dismal King?

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_01_AUTO_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_01_AUTO_CUT_.text: You'll not make a meal of me so easily!

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_01_ROUTE2_AU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_01_ROUTE2_AU.text:
You believe yourself worthy
to consume the Dismal King?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_03_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_03_CUT_000_0.text:
So this is your nest, mmm?
You've made quite the journey.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_CU.text:
Is that a seed in the black insect's nest?
Such a thing may provide a meal for the
small woodland creature.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_CU.text:
With the seed in my possession, I've no
further business with these insects.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_04_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_04_CUT_000_0.text:
It's approaching me. Does it wish
for me to take it somewhere?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_04_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_04_CUT_000_0.text:
I suppose I will take you there,
as it is on my path.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_CU.text:
They appear to carrying some sort of seed.
If I visit their nest, I may find something
the small woodland creature can eat.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_05_AUTO_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_05_AUTO_CUT_.text:
Is that some manner of hive?
What a strange shape it has.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_05_AUTO_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_05_AUTO_CUT_.text: Gah! It is full of flying insects!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_CU.text:
One of the flying insects has come to me.
Clearly it was being chased by the others.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_CU.text: Very well then, fly. Come with me.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_05_ROUTE2_CU.text:
I saw another of your kind
in the swamp. Let us go there.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_06_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_06_CUT_000_0.text:
There is something stuck in the web.
The wing of a bat, maybe?

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_06_ROUTE2_AU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_06_ROUTE2_AU.text:
A large fly is tangled in the web.
It will likely prove a fine meal
for the spider if left be.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.text:
These are juvenile wolves, I believe.
What are they chewing on?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.text:
That belongs to me, wolves.
Bring it to the Dismal King.
...Yes! What fine wolves!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_01_CUT_000.text:
Hopefully this will unpetrify that
shelled creature from earlier.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
There may be something in this cave.
I should take a look.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
Was this the home of that creature?
It appears to have hidden a number
of items in here.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
I see no signs of there being
anything deeper in this cave.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
There are fiends here, but nothing
of any real interest to me.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
As I suspected, there is nothing here,
and no reason to continue exploring.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_02_ROUTE2_.text:
A dead end? Mmm. Such is the
way of the world sometimes.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.text:
A carnivorous plant? I've heard
such things enjoy eating insects.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.text:
In this world where even plants are
hostile, I must be ever on my guard.

SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_FUNC_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_AUTO_CU.text:
Especially when I've an insect
in my company, it seems.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.text:
Mmm. That is no normal plant. 
I'd best keep my distance.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.text:
Ah, but there's something in its mouth.
I seems I must approach after all if I wish
to claim it.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.text:
Do not think you can consume
the Dismal King, plant!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.text:
This seems to be part of a shell.
Perhaps I can use it to unpetrify
that shelled creature.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_03_ROUTE2_.text:
Mmm, a piece of shell. Well, after all
the trouble I went through to get this,
I'm certainly going to take it.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUT_000.text:
A bird's nest? Ah, and it appears the
parent has already left—there are some
brown feathers scattered about.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUT_000.text:
And what is that in the nest?
The shed skin of a snake?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_CU.text:
Though the eggs are safe, they may
be targeted by the snake again.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_EGGS_CU.text:
I must locate the nest's owner
and ensure its safety.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.text:
Ah, so this must be your nest.
Your stolen eggs are right there.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.text:
And now you've destroyed the eggs?
Mmm, I see. Perhaps this was never
your nest in the first place.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_CUCKOO_.text: My apologies, bird! Aaah ha ha ha!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_04_OWL_CUT.text:
Do take care not to have your
eggs stolen again, bird.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.text:
Are you the parent of
the eggs from that nest?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.text:
I speak to you, bird! Heed me! Bah. This creature is in such a tizzy
that our conversation goes nowhere.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.text: Its plumage is grey and white.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_05_CUT_000.text: Shall I take this bird to the nest?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_06_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_06_CUT_000.text:
Do you hear me, bird? It is a dangerous
thing indeed to ignore the Dismal King!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_06_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_06_CUT_000.text:
Mmm. Its plumage is brown,
or perhaps beige.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.text:
See how this beast rampages around
while swinging its horns!

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.text:
Mmm? Look at the tip of that horn.
That is a bat wing, is it not?

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.text: There. The bat wing is mine.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.text:
But a bat requires two wings to fly,
so I must acquire a second.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_FOREST_07_ROUTE2_.text:
That is both wings. Now the creature
should be able to soar through the
dismal darkness once more.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.text:
You are worthy creatures, but I cannot
take you with me. However, I shall accept
your devotion, if not your comradeship.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You are a worthy creature, but I cannot
take you with me. However, I shall accept
your devotion, if not your comradeship.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.text:
You are a worthy creature, but I cannot
take you with me. However, I shall accept
your devotion, if not your comradeship.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_030_CUT_000_00.text:
You are a worthy creature, but I cannot
take you with me. However, I shall accept
your devotion, if not your comradeship.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_EAR.speaker: Tsunanori_SIUG
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_GUARDIAN_FOREST_04_EAR.text: Hmmm. Maybe I should give it this nut.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_EA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_03_ROUTE2_EA.text: Seeds? Here? I suppose there's no accounting for taste.

SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_EA.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W19_EVAR_SIUG_PLAT_NEST_04_ROUTE2_EA.text: It's carrying a seed of some sort. Perhaps their colony would provide a veritable bounty of them.
